reviewText: I purchased all 3 of these DVD's separately for my twin boys.  They're almost 3 years old now and they can't get enough of the Little Einsteins.  This 3-pack would be a great investment if your child(ren) is a fan of L.E.
I am very happy with the Little Einsteins videos.  I have shown them to my elementary music classes and they love them.
